import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { UserIcon, UserPlusIcon, ChevronDownIcon, ChevronRightIcon, Bars3Icon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { headers, wrapper, ca, falsee, menuBar } from '../store/reducers/exampleReducer'; import { motion, wrap } from 'framer-motion'; const Header = () => { const { header, modelWrapper, menu } = useSelector((state) => state.userManagament); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const container = { hidden: { opacity: 1, scale: 0 }, visible: { opacity: 1, scale: 1, transition: { delayChildren: 0.3, staggerChildren: 0.2 } } }; const item = { hidden: { y: 20, opacity: 0 }, visible: { y: 0, opacity: 1 } } const wrap = () => { setTimeout(() => { }, 100); } return (
